:• 2x '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• 1x '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2200 Nighthawk X4S Tri-Band Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/EX7500.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=EX7500}} * Web GUI: http://www.mywifiext.net "U12H340T05" and "802391 REV.0 GP" is silkscreened on the board :in the FCC photos (OEM: [[Foxconn]], -100NAS). "U12H361T00 LF", "ZPL001F", and "2144002234-01S1" are printed :on a label on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)}} ===See also=== *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices#AC2200]] *[[List of Netgear Nighthawk Products]]
